original_text: A day of darkness and of gloominess, a day of clouds and of thick darkness, as the morning spread upon the mountains: a great people and a strong; there hath not been ever the like, neither shall be any more after it, even to the years of many generations.
korean_text: 곧 어둡고 캄캄한 날이요 짙은 구름이 덮인 날이라 새벽 빛이 산 꼭대기에 덮인 것과 같으니 이는 많고 강한 백성이 이르렀음이라 이와 같은 것이 옛날에도 없었고 이후에도 대대에 없으리로다

sentences.original_text: A day of darkness and of gloominess
a day of clouds and of thick darkness
as the morning spread upon the mountains:
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 새벽이 산들에 퍼지는 것 같으니라

sentences.original_text: a great people and a strong;
there hath not been ever the like,
neither shall be any more after it,
even to the years of many generations.
